## BasicPositionerComponent.\_flipIfCollision() method

Flips html element position if collision occur

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected _flipIfCollision(popupElement: HTMLElement): [Positions.PositionsCss, Positions.PositionsCoordinates, Positions.PositionsCoordinates];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  popupElement | <code>HTMLElement</code> | Html element to be flipped if collisions occur |

`[Positions.PositionsCss, Positions.PositionsCoordinates, Positions.PositionsCoordinates]`
